section1_description: The definitive MakerDAO information source. Trying to understand how MakerDAO works? Or maybe you're just trying to find ways to contribute. We're here to help you get started with MakerDAO!
section2_add_your_content: Want to add your own content? Contribute to the Academy using the creator studio
